# About {-}

This document is a resource guide for advisors and faculty mentors working with students within the Social Science and Criminal Justice pathway. For general transfer resources, please see the [General Transfer Resource Guide](https://bateyt.github.io/resourceguide_gentransfer).

## Usage {-}

Each chapter provides details for related programs at LCC's most common transfer institutions.
